tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BicycleMaintenance (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 bicycle_id INT,
 task_name VARCHAR(255),
 task_description TEXT,
 scheduled_date DATE,
 completed_date DATE,
 technician VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE BicycleMaintenance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bike_id INT,
    maintenance_task VARCHAR(255),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    completed_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bike_id INT,
    service_type VARCHAR(255),
    mechanic_name VARCHAR(255),
    service_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE service_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  bicycle_id INT,
  service_date DATE,
  service_type TEXT,
  service_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bicycles (
  bicycle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  brand TEXT,
  model TEXT,
  purchase_date DATE,
  last_service_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bicycle_id INT NOT NULL,
  task_id INT NOT NULL,
  service_date DATE,
  technician_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (bicycle_id) REFERENCES BicycleOwners(owner_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES ServiceTasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Bicycles (
    bike_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bike_model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    bike_color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    owner_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES BicycleOwners(owner_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ServiceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bike_id INT,
    service_date DATE NOT NULL,
    service_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (bike_id) REFERENCES Bicycles(bike_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TaskAssignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    bike_id INT,
    assigned_worker VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    assigned_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTasks(task_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (bike_id) REFERENCES Bicycles(bike_id)
);
